column2: we shared the 22oz. bone in dry aged ribeye & added the roasted bone marrow
column3: along with a side of elote style corn. The ribeye was mouthwatering and cooked medium rare to perfection. Every bite was tender
column4: and only close to the bone was the meat too raw (for me). The elote style corn was good
column6: but the dish was WAY too salty. We each had a few tiny spoonfuls and that was all we could withstand.
